title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI
description: The ControlExampleText component in the application emits a beeping sound when I select the SWT.MULTI option. I believe this behavior is not intended.
OB: When I click on other buttons in the application, the bell sound is also triggered unexpectedly.
EB: The ControlExampleText component should not produce a beeping sound when selecting SWT.MULTI or when interacting with other buttons in the application.
SR: Investigate the cause of the beeping sound in the ControlExampleText component when selecting SWT.MULTI and fix the issue to prevent any unwanted sound effects from occurring.
